The Artist Formerly Known As Suukie stepped up beside Dinobot......he looked
t the wounded Dinobot.... "time to repay my dept, without doing so i will
never at night slept....." Suukie said....he slowly walked around Dinobot
and walked into the battle, shooting at Scourge...or was it?....he was so
confused that it could have been Tankor he was shooting at........
----- Original Message -----
From: "Carnage darkness" <carnage_blood@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, May 06, 2000 2:20 AM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> Carnage/ Dinobot
>
> * Carnage yelled in surprise as Tankorr threw her a few feet off to the
> side, she landed with a thud into the grass.
> She shook her head but then jumped to her feet, pulling out her gun again
> she fired repeatedly upon the Predacon general. Nobot messed with an
> assassin without some kind of reaction in store for them, and 9 out of 10
> chances it wasn't going to be a pleasant one!*
>
> ****************************************************************
>
> * Dinobot growled at Tavatron as she had walked away and towards the Ark,
> when she had looked at him the second time he knew that she had found
> something in him. Something...more.
> He reached down and collected his rifle, at least it was
undamaged...unlike
> himself!
> Dinobot sighed and soon caught up to Tavatron, he slapped her in the back
> with his tail for her remark.
> He growled deeply...*
>
> " Indeed, that IS a promise...smart alec!"
>
> * He then looked back towards the Maximals ship, it almost seemed to grow
> quiet now. The reason...he knew not.
> Dinobot looked down at the rifle in his hands but then wrenched as a sharp
> pain suddenly caught him by surprise, it seemed to be coming from the
exact
> place in which Scourge had kicked him!
> He placed a clawed hand on his stomach, it was more tender then he had
first
> thought. It almost seemed to start as a dull pain but then worked it's way
> into a feeling of utter excitation, as much as he was damaged he never
would
> have guessed that it was this much!
> But Dinobot wasn't one to cry out in pain at a mere glance, he could take
> it...for as long as he needed to!
> He breathed in deeply but even that brought discomfort, he then began to
> slow his breathing to a shallow intake...his chest barely expanding as he
> took in a little air at a time.
> Dinobot flexed his free hand and shrugged that shoulder, he was stiff and
> sore...not to mention the lack of food and rest.
> He snarled as the pain in his stomach first came to a tearful climax but
> then sighed as it almost seemed to fade away into nothing but what it was
> before...a dull pain. He would have started repairs...if he hadn't spent
> most of that energy repairing Tavatron...a small price to pay for the life
> of a fellow warrior.
> Dinobot glanced over at her, she had seemed to made a full recovery. That
> was good and it made this battle a little bit less hectic, just what an
> under-powered warrior needed after a battle and a secondary repair.
> He looked then at the Ark, but the battle was only a small thing...it was
> the war itself that mattered.
> Dinobot snarled and clenched his fist, the pain was back and with a
> vengeance...but that was not what mattered now. It was the survival of the
> Maximals and the survival of this planet that truly mattered!
> This was just a small battle...one that only made up a piece of the great
> war!*
